Formal notice for Suffolk’s Libraries IPS Ltd Annual General Meeting, Thursday, 10 September 2015

The Cookhouse

Suffolk Food Hall

Wherstead

Suffolk

IP9 2AB

Exhibitor Stalls 5.30pm-6.30pm, Buffet Supper 5.30pm, AGM 6.30pm-8.00pm

  1. Chair’s welcome and apologies for absence and Minutes of AGM, 11 September 2014
  2. Annual Report To receive the report for year ending 31 March 2015 from the Chair of the Board, Tony Brown, and the General Manager, Alison Wheeler.
  3. Accounts 2014/15 To receive the Statement of Accounts for the year 2014/15 presented by Jonathan Ogden, Honorary Treasurer.
  4. Election of Auditor To elect the Auditor – Larking Gowan Ltd.
  5. Announcement of the election of up to 2 Suffolk Libraries IPS Ltd Board Members
  6. Guest Speaker Author, Joanna Trollope
  7. Closing Remarks

The Annual General Meeting is open to the Membership of the Society, its employees and by invitation.

If you fall into one of these groups and would like to attend please contact Nikki Sturmey by 5pm on Friday 4 September 2015 at nikki.sturmey@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Download a copy of this formal notice (PDF).
